  =====================
--|  Secret Treasure  |--------------------------------------------------------
  =====================

This sub-section is covering the rare weapons location which counldn't be
found in the main walkthrough or only can be found with certain requirements.
Easy words: they are 'secrets'.

 -------------------------------------------------------------------------
 |  Reminder:                                                            |
 |    For the treasure in Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra layer, recommend  |
 |    clear the God/Darkness God mob hunt before search for them.        |
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------
  Zodiac Spear  |--------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------
(Spear type weapon)

Note:
It's call "Strongest Halberd" for Japanese version.

Location 1 - Necrohol of Nabudis, middle section.
             The small round area at the central passage, there are 16 treasure
             chests. It's in the second left treasure.

* Requirement - Do not open the treasure chest in front of the old man (Daran)
                house in Rabanastre Downtown.
              - Do not open the Elixir chest in Rabanastre Palace.
              - Do not open the treasure chests in Nalbina Dungeons inside the
                room where you get back your inventory.
              - Do not open the 16 treasure chests in Phon Coast South-East
                section.

- The 16 chests
http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_nabudis.png

- Zodiac Spear
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/Guide/zodiac_sp.jpg

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Henne Mines, East hidden section.
           - Go North from the Gate Crystal, then East.
           - In the secret section, turn right from the second junction. Follow
             the way until you reach to next mine route. Now pay attention
             to right side. Around crates, there is a small area which didn't
             shown in the map. The treasure chest will appear there.
           - Only 10% chance you can find the treasure, and only 10% chance
             could get this weapon.

- Here is the point
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/Guide/hen_str_hal.jpg

* Requirement - Must have at least 10 espers and finish Mind Flayer mob hunt
                mission (rank B).
              - Go Land Of The Garif find the geomancer to get some info, he's
                located at opposite of the Item Shop. Now back to Henne Mines,
                the gate to East has been unlocked.
              - Equip Diamond Armlet.


--------------
  Excalibur  |-----------------------------------------------------------------
--------------
(Greatsword type weapon)

Location - Ancient City of Giruvegan, upper layer of Crystal Grande.

The road to Ultima esper fight under "Esper / Summon" section has already
mentioned it. You can try search it with the map below as well, it's located in
Map 2, second treasure from right side. You might get few gils or Sage Ring
if Excalibur doesn't exist.

(check the second link if the first link doesn't work)
db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_crystal_grande_upper.png
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/crystal_map.jpg

Note : 1-If you didn't get it from that treasure, leave the Crystal Grande
         then re-enter for the second try. You can just visit to three other
         zones and come back, but for Japanese version, the chance of getting
         Excalibur wouldn't be increased by doing so.
       2-When Excalibur treasure appears, you will get other thing which is
         covering it. After open up the first treasure, you will see another
         treasure is still here, that's Excalibur.
       3-You don't need to equip Diamond Armlet, but depends on my experience,
         you need to get a Diamond Armlet in your inventory for more chances
         of Excalibur spawn.


-----------------
  Ultima Blade  |--------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------
(Greatsword type weapon)

Location - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra B2F.
         - Inner of North-East section, after the fake wall.

* Requirement - After Ridorana event.


--------------
  Fomalhaut  |-----------------------------------------------------------------
--------------
(Gun type weapon)

Location 1 - Lhusu Mines, South-West most.
           - Sector 9 Mining area, where Antlion mob was.
           - Might need to leave and return.

* Requirement - While handling or completed Antlion mob hunt mission (rank A).

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra B2F.
           - Inner of South-East section, after the fake wall.
           - The treasure is random.

* Requirement - After Ridorana event.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 3 - Henne Mines, East hidden section.
           - Check the picture below, find the number 1 treasure at East,
             near Zodiac/Zodiark Esper.

http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_henne_secret.png

* Requirement - Must have at least 10 espers and finish Mind Flayer mob hunt
                mission (rank B).
              - Go Land Of The Garif find the geomancer to get some info, he's
                located at opposite of the Item Shop. Now back to Henne Mines,
                the gate to East has been unlocked.
              - Equip Diamond Armlet. If not, you might get 10000 gil.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 4 - Cerobi Steppe
           - The plain just North of the Save Crystal known as Crossfield.
           - Around the middle of this section, in front the Shield Wyrm.
           - The treasure is random.

* Requirement - Story reaches to Port At Balfonheim.
              - Equip Diamond Armlet.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 5 - Cerobi Steppe
           - North-East section known as The Northsward.
           - Around the middle West of this section.
           - The treasure is random.

* Requirement - Story reaches to Port At Balfonheim.
              - Equip Diamond Armlet.


-------------------
  Dragon Whisker  |------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------
(Spear type weapon)

Location 1 - Pharos at Ridorana, Third Ascent 80F.
           - Warp from the Black medallion, it's near the Green medallion
             after the fake wall.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra B1F.
           - South-West section.

* Requirement - After Ridorana event.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 3 - Cerobi Steppe
           - Second section from Balfonheim.
           - Near the North-West end of this section.
           - The treasure is random.

* Requirement - Story reaches to Port At balfonheim.
              - Equip Diamond Armlet.


-----------------
  Rod Of Faith  |--------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------
(Rod type weapon)

Location - Bur Omisace, second section.
         - From the direction where you come from Gate Crystal, pay attention
           on the left side. Around middle of the road, you can see a giant
           Wyrm Snout, it looks like a rock.
         - Check the Wyrm Snout and you will see a shiny object appears on the
           ground, it's the Faith Rod and 500,000 gil.

* Requirement - Complete Behemoth King Mob Hunt mission (rank H), get the
                reward from your client.
              - Unequip Vaan's weapon before checking the Wyrm Snout.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE: 
1.Most of them available in more than one place, I just list down the first
  place that you can buy or find the shield/armor.

2.For those which can only be obtained by special ways, can read the
  bottom part of this section '12-5. Secret Treasure' for more details.

3.For those which can only get from trading, can read 'Special Trading'
  under "Secret Matters" section.

4.From those which are connecting with rare monster quest, please check
  on the other in depth guide for more details of the 80 Rare Monsters below:

http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_80_rare.txt

12-5. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  =====================
--|  Secret Treasure  |--------------------------------------------------------
  =====================

This sub-section is covering the rare weapons location which counldn't be
found in the main walkthrough or only can be found with certain requirements.
Easy words: they are 'secrets'.

----------------------
  Zodiac Escutcheon  |---------------------------------------------------------
----------------------
(shield)

Location 1 - Ancient City of Giruvegan, upper layer of Crystal Grande.

Please reference the map below. The treasure is in the Map 3, rigthen platform
which is behind the Gate Taurus 2nd.

(check the second link if the first link doesn't work)
db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_crystal_grande_upper.png
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/crystal_map.jpg

Note: 1-Equip Diamond Armlet.
      2-If you get Brave Suit (light armor) in the treasure, the 
        Zodiac Escutcheon will not exist here anymore.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Barheim Passage.
           - Second East section from the Zalera esper arena.
           - Find the ended path to South, the chest behind some traps.
           - The treasure is random.

- Here is the point:
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/Guide/shield.jpg

Note: 1-Complete 'Back to Barheim Passage' side quest.
      2-Equip Diamond Armlet.
      3-Some stranges thing will happen when the Zodiac Escutcheon existing.
        Normally when you close to any treasure, your character would have "!"
        mark. When you tight to the treasure chest, "Treasure" sign appears.
        For this treasure, you can only see the "Treasure" sign in a very short
        moment, then it will become "!" again even if you tight to it. If you
        couldn't get this treasure during the "Treasure" sign appear, just get
        further abit from the treasure and try again.


--------------------
  Venetian Shield  |-----------------------------------------------------------
--------------------
(shield)

Location - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra, B2F.
         - The treasure at the right corner BEFORE the stairs.
         - The treasure is random.

* Requirement - After Ridorana event.



-----------------------
  Ensanguined Shield  |--------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------
(shield)

Location 1 - Henne Mines, East hidden section.
           - Start from Eastern section, the mine route just right after the
             passage, turn left from the function.
           - The treasure is random.

- Here is the point (mark as 'X')
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/Guide/hen_blood.jpg

* Requirement - Must have at least 10 espers and finish Mind Flayer mob hunt
                mission (rank B).
              - Go Land Of The Garif find the geomancer to get some info, he's
                located at opposite of the Item Shop. Now back to Henne Mines,
                the gate to East has been unlocked.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Feywood, South-West section before Giruvegan
           - The treasure is random.

- Here is the point, on the trap
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/Guide/en_shield.jpg

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 3 - Port At Balfonheim, North section.
           - The only treasure nside the right (East) Port Villa.
           - The treasure is random, and the change is very low.

* Requirement - Equip Diamond Armlet?


-----------------
  Shell Shield  |-------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------
(Shield)

Location - Stillshrine of Miriam.
         - From the Save Crystal, go to bottom which leads to West corridor.
         - Wait at abit South from the corridor junction, the wall will
           disappear and become a stair which leads to West again. Follow the
           stair until the upper area where the treasure by.
         - You will be sent Berserk and Confuse when you step to the last area.
         - You might get Dark Matter from this treasure.
         - Becareful the trap!


------------
  Circlet  |------------------------------------------------------------------
------------
(Mystic Armor)

Location 1 - Pharos at Ridorana, Third Ascent, 84F.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra, B3F.
           - Inner area of South-West section, after the fake wall.

* Requirement - After Ridorana event.


-----------------
  Lordly Robes  |--------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------
(Mystic Armor)

Location 1 - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra B3F.
           - North-East section with a Magic Pot.
           - The treasure is random.

http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_ridorana_subterra.png

* Requirement - After Ridorana event.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Henne Mines, East hidden section.
           - South-East area. Check the map below.

http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_henne_secret.png

* Requirement - Must have at least 10 espers and finish Mind Flayer mob hunt
                mission (rank B).
              - Go Land Of The Garif find the geomancer to get some info, he's
                located at opposite of the Item Shop. Now back to Henne Mines,
                the gate to East has been unlocked.


---------------
  Brave Suit  |----------------------------------------------------------------
---------------
(Light Armor)

Location 1 - Ancient City of Giruvegan, upper layer of Crystal Grande.

Please reference the map below. The treasure is in the Map 3, rigthen platform
which is behind the Gate Taurus 2nd.

 (check the second link if the first link doesn't work)
db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_crystal_grande_upper.png
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/crystal_map.jpg

Note: 1-Equip Diamond Armlet.
      2-If you get Zodiac Escutcheon in the treasure, the Brave Suit will not
        exist here anymore.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Henne Mines, East hidden section.
           - From the first junction or the South-East area.
             Check the map below.

http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_henne_secret.png

* Requirement - Must have at least 10 espers and finish Mind Flayer mob hunt
                mission (rank B).
              - Go Land Of The Garif find the geomancer to get some info, he's
                located at opposite of the Item Shop. Now back to Henne Mines,
                the gate to East has been unlocked.
              - Equip Diamond Armlet.


-----------------
  Dueling Mask  |--------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------
(Light Armor)

Location 1 - Pharos at Ridorana, First Ascent 35F.
           - Already mentioned in the walkthrough, just need to kill Deidar
             to build a bridge to the treasure.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra B3F.
           - South-East section.
           - The treasure is random.

* Requirement - After Ridorana event.

13-2. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------
  Bubble Belt  |---------------------------------------------------------------
----------------

Location - Barheim Passage, East-West Bypass.
         - Narrow down to this section, find the dead end to East.
         - The last treasure in the dead end, surrounding by many mimic.

* Requirement - Barheim Key is needed, check '7a-3. Back to Barheim Passage'.
              - Equip Diamond Armlet.


---------------
  Nihopalaoa  |----------------------------------------------------------------
---------------

Location - Pharos At Ridorana, Subterra B2F.
         - North-West room.

* Requirement - Story passed Pharos At Ridorana.


-----------
  Ribbon  |--------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------

Location 1 - Henne Mines, East hidden section.
           - First go to the end of the first route to get the map for easy
             understand the informations below.
           - Go to the Eastern area of thie section which displays like an
             'fliped L' shape
                    .-.
                   (   ) 
                    | |
                    | |
                    | |
                    | \
          ..-_______\  \
         ( R  _______   )   R = Ribbon
          '--'       '-'

           - There is another treasure chest besides Ribbon, it's higher chance
             to appear compair to Ribbon.
           - The Ribbon treasure chest won't always appear, you have to keep
             returning to this section and check it.

* Requirement - Must have at least 10 espers and finish Mind Flayer mob hunt
                mission (rank B).
              - Go Land Of The Garif find the geomancer to get some info, he's
                located at opposite of the Item Shop. Now back to Henne Mines,
                the gate to East has been unlocked.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 2 - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra B3F.
           - Inner of North-West section, NOT in the room with Magic Pot.
           - The treasure is random.

* Requirement - After Ridorana event.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Location 3 - Cerobi Steppe.
           - North from Save Crystal known as Crossfield.
           - The treasure is random.

Here is the point:
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/Guide/ribbon1.jpg

* Requirement - Equip Diamond Armlet.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Chance of drops
- Rare monster No.44, Vishno
   - In the First Ascent of Pharos at Ridorana, 
     appears after killing certain amount of Brainpan and Deidar,
     at 48F with an Aeronite. But it's a rare drop.

- Lv 99 Red Chocobo
   - Ozmone Plains, in the zone that's near Jahara,
     appears after killing certain amount of chocobo around without leaving
     the section. But it's a rare appearance. (thanks to Capeguy/Jason Martin)

14. Secret Matters
14-1. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  O-------------------------------O -------------------------------------------
  |  Sky Pirate's Den Characters  | 
--O-------------------------------O                                      [s141]


Under 'Clan Report/Clan Primer' option, there's a Sky Pirate's Den, the
characters will be unlock once you get to certain requirements.

------------------
< Main Character >
------------------

   =================================================
   |  Character  |           Requirement           |
   =================================================
   |  Vaan       -  Steal 50 times from enemies    |
   |  Penelo     -  Obtained gil reach to 100,000  |
   |  Ashe       -  Average party level over 50    |
   |  Balthier   -  Attack over 300 times          |
   |  Fran       -  Cast magic 200 times           |
   |  Basch      -  Defeat 500 enemies             |
   -------------------------------------------------


------------------------
< Non-player Character >
------------------------

   =========================================================
   |  Character  |               Requirement               |
   =========================================================
   |  Dalan      -  Enter every zones in the Ivalice*      |
   |  Gurdy      -  Spended gil reach to 1,000,000         |
   |  Gabranth   -  Trigger all concurrences (Quickening)  |
   |  Migelo     -  Sell over 1000 loot                    |
   |  Montblanc  -  Get chain combo up to 50               |
   |  Rasler     -  Master all characters License Board    |
   |  Reks       -  Total Clan Point reach to 500,000      |
   |  Vayne      -  Perform technique/skill 100 times      |
   |  Vossler    -  Collect all techniques/skills          |
   ---------------------------------------------------------

 *Note: Not only just obtain tha maps, you must enter every zones
       (except final dungeon) at least once to unlock Dalan.


--------------------
< Enemy Characters >
--------------------

   ===============================================================
   |    Character    |                Requirement                |
   ===============================================================
   |  Carrot         -  Clear Carrot mob hunting mission         |
   |  Death Gaze     -  Clear Death Gaze mob hunting mission     |
   |  Fafnir         -  Clear Fafnir mob hunting mission         |
   |  Gilgamesh      -  Clear Gilgamesh mob hunting mission      |
   |  Hell Wyrm      -  Defeat Hell Wyrm/Majinryuu optional boss |
   |  Behemoth King  -  Clear Behemoth King mob hunting mission  |
   |  Mimic          -  Unlock Canopic Jar in Bazzar and buy it  |
   |  Trickster      -  Clear Trickster mob hunting mission      |
   |  Yazmat/Yiazmat -  Clear Yazmat mob hunting mission         |
   ---------------------------------------------------------------

14. Secret Matters
14-3. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  O-------------------O -------------------------------------------------------
  |  Special Trading  |
--O-------------------O                                                  [s143]

There are some special items in the game which you can only get from the shops
by trading with your treasure. This section has covered all the special trade
goods requirement (not including normal items which can be found from the
appointed shop).

Some of the treasure will only exist when you have the Lore below, so lets
begin to collect all Lores before going for other items.

14-3-1
===============================================================================
|  Lore/Sp.  |          Effect           |        Requirement        |  Cost  |
===============================================================================
| Hunter's   | Increase treasure drops   | Clear Thextera Mob/Mark,  |  18000 |
| Monograph  | from monster & avion type | then talk to Gatsly in    |        |
|            | enemies.                  | Rabanastre, Muthru Bazaar.|        |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Knight's   | Increase treasure drops   | Talk to any weapon shop   |  19000 |
| Monograph  | from giant & insect type  | owner over 30 times.      |        |
|            | enemies.                  |                           |        |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Mage's     | Increase treasure drops   | Talk to any magic shop    |  21000 |
| Monograph  | from fiend type enemies.  | owner over 25 times.      |        |
|            |                           |                           |        |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Dragoon's  | Increase treasure drops   | Read the Mob Hunt         |  22000 |
| Monograph  | from dragon & plant type  | bulletin board 40 times.  |        |
|            | enemies.                  |                           |        |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Sage's     | Increase treasure drops   | Talk to any shop onwer    |  25000 |
| Monograph  | from elemental spirit     | over 100 times.           |        |
|            | type enemies.             |                           |        |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Warmage's  | Increase treasure drops   | Read the Mob Hunt         |  20000 |
| Monograph  | from mollusk & undead     | bulletin board 20 times.  |        |
|            | type enemies.             |                           |        |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Scholar's  | Increase treasure drops   | Talk to any armor shop    |  22000 |
| Monograph  | from specialist type      | owner over 15 times.      |        |
|            | enemies.                  |                           |        |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Canopic    | All monsters can drop     | *Sell off Phobos Glaze,   | 250000 |
| Jar        | the Arcana.               | Horakhty's Flame, and     |        |
|            |                           | Deimos Clay.              |        |
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Phobos Glaze, Horachty's Flame and Deimos Clay are the rewards of Mob Hunt of
 Gil Snapper/Gilgame (rank C), Orthros (rank A) and Trickster (rank A).

14-3-3.
===================== 
= Treasure Location =|=========================================================
=====================


     ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     |                            Reminder                               |
     |-------------------------------------------------------------------|
     |  Some of the treasures are the rare drops or rare steal, depends  |
     |  on luck. Most of them are almost impossible to be found within   |
     |  a few tries, even with the appointed Lores. Nothing you can do   |
     |  other than keep on trying.                                       |
     |-------------------------------------------------------------------|
     |  Tips & Hints:                                                    |
     |  - Equip Thief Cuffs accessory when stealing the treasure from    |
     |    any monster.                                                   |
     |  - Defeat the same monster to get higher chain combo, so you      |
     |    would have higher chances to get the rare treasure.            |
     --------------------------------------------------------------------- 


Don't forget to check the details of rare monster for certain treasures here:

http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_80_rare.txt


  -------------------
--| Venetian Shield | (Shield) |-----------------------------------------------
  -------------------

 = Undin Halcyon x1
   - Steal from Undin Entite - Cerobi Steppe, raining or cloudy weather,
                               second section from Balfonheim.
                             - Rare appearance in Pharos at Ridorana, 50F.

 = Ancient Turtle Shell x2
   - Drops from Adamantitan - Cerobi Steppe, central East section,
                              where splited to three area.
   - Pouch from Silicon Tortoise - Giza Plains when raining.
                                 - Zertinan Cavern, around the West.

 = Ring Wyrm Liver x2
   - Drops or Poach Shield Dragon - Cerobi Steppe,
                                    North from Save Crystal section.
                                  - Nabreus Deadlands,
                                    North section where connecting to Nabudis.
   - Steal from Lindwyrm (Mob/Mark) - Tchita Uplands when cloudy.


  ------------------
--| Artemis Arrows | (Ammunition) |--------------------------------------------
  ------------------

 = Gemini Gem x3
   - Reward from Hunt Club owner in Archades after collecting
     20 Engage/Trophy Items from rare monster.
   - Drops from Behemoth - Feywood many areas.
                         - Giruvegan many areas
   - Drops or Steal from Blood Gigas - Stillshrine Of Miriam,
                                       West bottom from the Save Crystal.
   - Drops or Steal from Slaven Wilder - Mosphoran Highwaste.
   - Drops or Steal from Bune - Pharos at Ridorana, Second Ascent or Subterra.
   - Drops or Steal from Reaver - Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra.
   - Steal from rare monster No.75 - Sochen Cave Palace,
                                     North from the five ways section,
                                     which is a circle with a cross area.

 = Vampyr Fang x2
   - Reward of Bloodwing Mob/Mark Hunt mission.
   - Drops or Steal from Abysteel - Henne Mines, East hidden section,
                                    the road to secret Esper Zodiac.
                                  - Lhusu Mines, inner area after Site 11 gate.
   - Steal from rare monster No.42 - Sochen Cave Palace, Fall of Time section,
                                     inside the secret room.

 = Dorsal Fin x2
   - Drops from Focalor - Sochen Cave Palace.
                        - Nabreus Deadlands,
                          two section North from the Gate Crystal.
   - Poach rare monster No.12 - Giza Plains, randomly appear in the West area.
   - Poach rare monster No.14 - Phon Coast, West area after chaining Piranha.


  --------------
--| Grand Bolt | (Ammunition) |------------------------------------------------
  --------------

 = Capricorn Gem x3
   - Drops from Zombie Knight - Sochen Cave Palace, many areas.
   - Drops from Necrophobe - Crystal Grande/The Great Crystal,
                             upper layer is easier to find it.
   - Drops from Reaper - Crystal Grande/The Great Crystal,
                         upper layer is easier to find it.
   - Drops from Necrofiend - Pharos at Ridorana, Third Ascent or Subterra.
                           - Henne Mines, East hidden section,
                             the road to secret Esper Zodiac.
   - Drops from Dead Bones - Barheim Passage, must get Barheim Key,

14. Secret Matters
14-4. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  O-------------------------O -------------------------------------------------
  |  Feed The Wild Saurian  |
--O-------------------------O                                            [s144]

Here is only a minor secret, feed the Wild Saurian in Dalmasca Estersand.
It doesn't matter at all actually, but I found this interesting since I got
the unexpected damage number from this nothing-special monster.

  Ok, this is actually nothing other than to gain a little more EXP points
  from the Wild Saurian in Dalmasca Estersand, experience the monster with
  strongest attack power and the strongest defence in the game, that's all.
  NO EXTRA REWARD~!

If you want to find it out,  prepare a strongest gun type weapon, highest
evasion shield or at least 2 character with Lv3 Mist Knack/Quickening skills.

Once you've done, go Dalmasca Estersand from Rabanastre, you can find a
Wild Saurian after going through some Wolves.  Now lure a Wolf to attack,
then bring it closer to the Wild Saurian  and it will perform Cannibalize
to feeds itself with the Wolf to level up.  Wild Saurian will not attack
your character until you disturb it, so before it gets stronger, just keep
on bringing the Wolves and let them Cannibalized by the Wild Saurian.

Below is a rough list of Wild Saurian's stats at certain level:


                   ==============================
                   |     Wild Saurian Stats     |
                   ==============================
        ------------------------  --------------------------
        |  Lv  | Max.HP | Str. |  |  Lv  | Max. HP |  Str. |
        |----------------------|  |------------------------|
        |  29  |  6001  |  29  |  |  61  |   9521  |   89  |
        |  34  |  6551  |  39  |  |  68  |  10291  |   96  |
        |  40  |  7211  |  47  |  |  73  |  10840  |  113  |
        |  43  |  7541  |  53  |  |  81  |  11721  |  122  |
        |  48  |  8091  |  63  |  |  87  |  12381  |  143  |
        |  51  |  8421  |  69  |  |  97  |  13481  |  162  |
        |  57  |  9081  |  77  |  |  99  |  13701  |  167  |
        ------------------------  --------------------------

As you can see its strength increase so much after Lv60. When Wild Saurian
gets stronger, it can deal 9999 with its physical attack no matter how high
your defense is. None other than Lv99 Wild Saurian in the game can deal this
large damage, so be prepared well when you're getting to be attacked. Be sure
you use Mist Knack/Quickening or use your strongest gun type weapon to kill
it, because other weapons can only deal 0 damage to Wild Saurian.

 Ok, the non-sense secret ended here.

15-2. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  O-----------------O ---------------------------------------------------------
  |  Maps Location  |
--O-----------------O                                                    [s152]

** Check the World Map and select the location, if there's a map icon beside
   the place you selected indicates you have got the map for this place.

Nalbina Fortress      - Default
Dalmasca Estersand    - Buy from Moogle in Dalmasca Estersand, costs 50 gil
Dalmasca Westersand   - Buy from Moogle in Rabanastre, Southern Plaza, 550 gil
Giza Plains (dry)     - Buy from Moogle in Rabanastre, Southern Plaza, 30 gil
Garamsythe Waterway   - After Gambit tutorial, check the urn at North-East
Garamsythe Waterway 2 - Firemane defeated, check the urn in East Sluice Control
Palace of Rabanastre  - When just visit to this place, check the urn behind

Nalbina Dungeons      - Obtain during scene
Barheim Passage       - The urn in Great Eastern Passage section
Barheim Passage 2     - The urn in The Zeviah Span section, need Barheim Key
SkyCity of Bhujerba   - Buy from Moogle in Bhujerba, costs 70 gil
Lhusu Mines           - Buy from Moogle in Bhujerba, costs 650 gil
Lhusu Mines 2         - The urn in Site 5 section, need Site 3 and Site 11 Key
Dreadnought Leviathan - Obtain at the beginning when reached here
Ogir-Yensa Sandsea    - The urn in Platform 1 - Refinery section
Nam-Yensa Sandsea     - The urn in Augur Hill section

Tomb of Raithwall     - After second Demon Wall, check the urn near Way Stones
Eruyt Village         - Buy from Moogle in Eruyt Village, costs 60 gil
Ozmone Plains         - Buy from Moogle in Jahara, costs 1700 gil
Jahara                - Buy from Moogle in Jahara, costs 70 gil
Golmore Jungle        - The urn in Path of Chained Light section
Henne Mines           - The urn in Phase 1 Shaft section, South-West
Henne Mines 2         - The urn in Phase 2 Dig section, need to be unlocked
Mt. Bur Omisace       - Buy from Moogle in Mt. Bur Omisace, costs 15 gil
Paramina Rift         - Buy from Moogle in Mt. Bur Omisace, costs 3200 gil
Stillshrine of Miriam - The urn in Ward of Steel, after Vinuskar boss fight

Mosphoran Highwaste - Buy from Moogle in Dalmasca Estersand, costs 2400 gil
Salikawood          - The urn in Trunkwall Road section.
Phon Coast          - Buy from Moogle in Phon Coast, costs 1800 gil
City of Archades    - Buy from Moogle in City of Archades, costs 230 gil
Tchita Uplands      - Buy from Moogle in City of Archades, costs 3300 gil
Sochen Cave Palace  - The urn in Mirro of the Soul section
Draklor Laboratory  - Obtain during the scene
Port at Balfonehim  - Buy from Moogle in Balfonheim, costs 30 gil
Cerobi Steppe       - Buy from Moogle in Balfonheim, costs 4100 gil
Feywood             - The urn in Walk of Stolen section
Feywood 2           - The urn in White Magick's Embrace section
Giruvegan           - The urn in The Trimahla Water-Steps section,
                      *you can find it only after the Giruvegan events

Ridorana Cataract                - Colosseum section, the urn at North-West
Pharos at Ridorana, First Ascent - The urn in Wellspring Labyrinth, South area
Pharos at Ridorana, Second Ascent- The urn in Station of Suffering, North-West
Pharos at Ridorana, Third Ascent - The urn in 79F
Pharos at Ridorana, Subterra     - No map for this place, you need to unlock
                                   all levels to consider obtain the map.
                                   (might need to visit all rooms)

Zertinan Cavern     - The urn in Balanka Fault section
Nabreus Deadlands   - The urn in Vale of Lingering Sorrow section
Necrohol of Nabudis - Defeat Humbaba Boss optional boss in Nabudis

BONUS maps for you:
- Pharos At Ridorana / Subterra Map
http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_ridorana_subterra.png

- The Great Crystal/Crystal Grande upper layer map - Buy from Sephirosuy :)
  (check the second link if the first link doesn't work)
db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_crystal_grande_upper.png
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v515/sephiroth_y/crystal_map.jpg

*** NOTE ***
  To unlock Dalan in the Sky Pirate Den, you must enter every zones of
  every locations except Sky Fortress Bahamut.



15. Extra Informations
15-3. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  O---------------------O -----------------------------------------------------
  |  Bazaar Goods List  |
--O---------------------O                                                [s153]

This sub section is only an overview of the Bazaar Goods and titles, to find
out the details, please check the existing Bazaar Goods & Loots FAQ here:

http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_bazaar_loot.txt

Or you can check for ultimate weapon trading under "14-3 Special Trading"
section, which is covered some of the Bazaar Goods listed here.


Note:
 As mentioned in other section of this guide, the "Trade Goods" I had
 translated from the Japanese version is actually same as the "Bazaar Goods".

 To unlock a Bazaar Goods, you don't need to sell all require loots in once,
 the Bazaar Goods will be unlocked as long as you sold enough of the loots.
 However, don't sell over amount, or else the extra loots will be canceled.

(sort by name)

15. Extra Informations
15-4. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  O-----------------O ---------------------------------------------------------
  |  Usage Of Loot  |
--O-----------------O                                                    [s154]

This sub-section displays the usage (most them are to unlock Bazaar Goods)
of each loots/treasures in the game. I only display the Bazaar Goods Title
here, to find out what is included in the goods, please read the sub-section
above (15-3 Bazaar Goods List) or the full Bazaar Goods & Loots FAQ at this
link:

http://db.gamefaqs.com/console/ps2/file/final_fantasy_xii_bazaar_loot.txt

 ** REMINDER For how to get certain loots
            Drop, Steal or any other ways to get these loots were mentioned
            in the Bazaar Goods & Loots FAQ (the link above). I only write
            down those are not listed in the Bazaar Goods & Loots FAQ.

 FORMAT:

 ==================================================================
 |      Loot/Treasure      | Value |     Goods Title (amount)     |
 ==================================================================
           ^                   ^                 ^
           |                   |                 |
           |                   |           Bazaar Good that needs this loot
  Loot/Treasure's name   selling price     to be unlocked (quantity needed);
                                           or other usages.


 (sort by name)

=========================================================================
  No. |  %  | RE? | No Diamond Armlet |  w/Diamond Armlet  |    Area
=========================================================================
  |      |     |             |                  \               \
  |      |     |        the possible             \               \
  #      |     \       treasure if you     the possible       which part of
    percentage  \       did NOT EQUIP     treasure if you    this section the
     of this     \      Diamond Armlet       EQUIP the        treasure found
     treasure     \                        Diamond Armlet
      spawn     can this
                treasure respawn?
                  O = Yes
                  X = No

  Many treasures can be placed by gil randomly, I didn't list them down.
  Press Ctrl + F keys and fill in the location to search it easier.

- question about the game, I'm glad to help if I know the answer.
- suggestions or advices for the guide.
- having the useful informations, if it does work well I will use it in
  the guide, sure your name will be credited.

But please properly write down your message or I won't reply you.

Mails that're blank, flaming, virus, spam, question about the information
covered in the FAQ will be ignored as well. And I've noticed some exceptions
people, who were probably jealous of my FAQ. Please, idiots, what's your point?
Just because you can't write a better FAQ doesn't give you a reason to send
hate mails. I'm not saying my FAQ is good, but I just do whatever I could to
guide players.

Lastly, please write down the game tittle on your topic, sometimes I don't
even know which game were you asking.

To read all my latest guides and other contributions on GameFAQs,
please visit the URL below.
